title: Women Respond To Donald Trump Telling Female Staffers To #DressLikeAWoman!
text:
2/03/2017 4:47   Fashion Smashion • Donald Trump • Hillary Clinton • Twitter • Viral: News • Girl Power 
Donald Trump 's relationship with the female population doesn't seem to be improving. 
In fact, a new report claims the president has requested his female staffers "dress like a woman" — and the ladies of Twitter are NOT here for it. 
Reporters at new media company Axios recently spoke to a source who worked on Trump's campaign, who dished that the bronzed businessman likes his employees to be dressed to impress. 
The source said a strict wardrobe policy applies to both men and women, explaining: 
"If you're going to be a public person for him, whether it's a lawyer or representing him in meetings, then you need to have a certain look. That look ― at least for any male ― you have to be sharply dressed." 
Sure, that makes sense. 
But the source also added that Trump's simple instructions for his female staffers' dress code — which is "dress like a woman" — led many women on the campaign trail to feel pressure to wear dresses in order to impress the orange boss man! 
Related: Kellyanne Conway Reveals Own Story Of Sexual Harassment 
Once this report was published, Twitter responded by explaining what it really means to "dress like a woman": being a woman and wearing whatever the fuck you want! 
Users posted photos of women wearing hijabs, military uniforms, police uniforms, fancy tuxedo suits, astronaut suits, and of course Hillary Clinton pantsuits!
